data.text: Chikuru itu kawuoyo, yaye polo;
We puonjna ochwe ka koth
Abiro lando nying Jehova Nyasaye
En Lwanda, tijene ler
Ogandani en tiengʼ makoch kendo mobam,
Bende ma e yo ma ugoyonego Jehova Nyasaye erokamano,
Paruru ndalo mosekadho,
E kinde ma Nyasaye Man Malo Moloyo nomiyo ogendini girkeni mag-gi,
Nimar joka Jakobo en pok Jehova Nyasaye owuon
Noyudo joka Jakobo kama otimo ongoro,
mano bende e kaka ongo yiengo ode
Jehova Nyasaye kende ema ne otelonegi;
Nomiyo giringo e kor gode manie piny
Bende negiyudo mo moleny gi chak mag dhok
Jeshurun ne odongo mobedo machwe;
Negimiyo nyiego omake gi nyisechegigo,
Negitimo misango ne jochiende ma ok gin Nyasaye,
Ne ujwangʼo lwanda ma en wuonu,
Jehova Nyasaye ne oneno ma mi oweyogi
Nowacho niya, “Abiro pandonegi wangʼa”
negimiyo nyiego omaka gi gima ok Nyasaye
Mach osemoki gi mirimba,
Abiro medo masiche mangʼeny kuomu,
Abiro oro kech malit e diergi,
Kihondko kod kibaji nogogi e miechgi;
Ne awacho ni abiro keyogi
to ne alingʼ kane awinjo weche mag jasigu
Gin oganda maonge rieko,
Ka dine bed ni giriek dine gingʼeyo tiend gik matimore
Ere kaka ngʼato achiel nyalo riembo ji alufu achiel,
Nimar lwanda margi ok en Lwandawa
Mzabibu margi wuok e mzabibu ma Sodom
Divai margi en kwiri mar thuonde,
Donge asekano wachni
An ema nachul kuor, abiro chulo.
Jehova Nyasaye biro ngʼado bura ne joge
Enowach niya, “Nyisecheugo nikanye,
ma gin nyiseche mane ochamo gik machwe mag misengini
“Ngʼeuru malongʼo ni An e Nyasaye
Atingʼo bada malo kawacho niya,
kendo ka asepiago liganglana mamil,
Abiro miyo asere maga tim remo
Un pinje, beduru mamor gi jogi,
Musa nobiro gi Joshua wuod Nun kendo nosomo weche mag wendni ka ji winjo.
Kane Musa osetieko somo weche mag wendni ne jo-Israel,
nowachonegi niya, “Rituru wechegi ma asomonu kawuononi mondo chiengʼ moro upuonj nyithindu mondo oluw adimba wechegi duto manie chike.
Wechegi ok gin weche manono to gin e ngimau. Kurito wechegi to gibiro miyo udag amingʼa e piny mubiro kawo ka usengʼado aora Jordan.”
Odiechiengno Jehova Nyasaye nowachone Musa niya,
“Idh Got mar Nebo ma en achiel kuom gode mag Abarim manie piny Moab, yo Jeriko kendo ine piny Kanaan, ma en piny mabiro miyo jo-Israel kar girkeni margi.
Ewi got malo kuma idhiyoeno ema inithoe, mi iki gi ogandau, mana kaka owadu Harun notho e got Hor mi oike gi kwerene.
Ma notimore nikech un ji ariyogi ne uweya e nyim jo-Israel kar pi mar Meriba Kadesh man e piny ongoro mar Zin kendo nikech ne ok urito nyinga maler e kind jo-Israel.
Kuom mano, inine mana pinyno gi kuma bor ok inidonjie e piny ma amiyo jo-Israel.”
